alert.note: Alert for Albany; Greene (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 2:40PM EDT until July 09 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Albany County in east central New York... Northeastern Greene County in east central New York... * Until 315 PM EDT. * At 240 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coxsackie, or 10 miles north of Hudson, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Westerlo, Ravena, Coxsackie, Feura Bush, Coeymans Hollow, South Albany, West Coxsackie, Spawn Hollow, Dormansville, Callanans Corners, Keefers Corners, Earlton, Otter Hook, Climax, Bethlehem Heights, Hannacroix, South Bethlehem, Medway, Paradise Hill and Grapeville. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
